Speaker B: It really depends! Personally, I love the castles! Visby is probably my favorite spot.

Speaker A is considering visiting their cousin in Sweden and needs to save money for the trip, causing Speaker B to recommend checking out the volcanoes in Sweden for a unique experience.

Do you have any favorite things to do when traveling>? ### Speaker A: Yes, I always like to check out local music and local coffee shops for random conversations. I think growing up there is what sparked my interest in good coffee as well as good chocolates' }
